headline: State Street (NYSE:STT) Appoints Veteran John Woods as New Chief Financial Officer
summary: State Street (NYSE:STT) recently announced the appointment of John F. Woods as its new CFO, a significant executive change that brings leadership with extensive industry experience. Despite the company's share price rising 5.6% over the past week, broader market trends showed a similar upward move of 5.2%, driven by a mix of economic developments and corporate earnings. Although the executive change at State Street might have added weight to its share performance, it aligns with the general...

headline: Citizens names Coughlin president; CFO to join State Street
summary: Citizens Financial Group's promotion of Brendan Coughlin to company president comes at the same time as CFO John Woods prepares to leave for State Street. Both executives have been viewed as potential successors to CEO Bruce Van Saun.

headline: State Street Appoints John F. Woods to Chief Financial Officer
summary: BOSTON, April 30, 2025--State Street Corporation (NYSE: STT) announced today that it has appointed John F. Woods to Chief Financial Officer (CFO). Woods, who will join State Street in late August, succeeds Mark Keating who has served as interim CFO since February. Upon joining State Street, Woods will report to Ron O’Hanley, State Street’s chairman and chief executive officer.
